attack.heavy:
If the target isn’t Bleeding when the last strike hits, it has a 50% chance to cause Bleed, doing 70% of Gwen’s attack over 5 seconds.

If the target is already Bleeding, the attack instead gains a 100% chance to convert 1 existing Bleed to cause 450% of Gwen’s attack as direct damage, over 23 seconds.
attack.description: All attacks have a 25% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 70% of your Attack as direct damage over 5 seconds.
attack.note: 3% chance to Stun per Bleed active on target, lasting for 0.75 seconds.

1.description: 100% chance to Incinerate the target, dealing 98% of your Attack as Energy Damage for 14 seconds.
1.name: Slice, Slice, Bang!
1.note: This effect also removes Perfect Block chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while active..

2.description: 100% chance to Enervate the target, preventing them from gaining Power when struck for 6 seconds.
2.name: Down, Set, Boom!
2.note: When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed off the opponent to re-apply itself

3.description:
100% chance to Armor Break, removing enemy Armor and applying a 115% Armor reduction for 14
seconds.
3.name: Watch This!
3.note: When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed off the opponent to re-apply itself.

signature.description: She also reduces her opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy, based on her current combo count.
signature.name: Plot Armor
